parameters.value: sqrt(amplitude_attack ^ 2 + amplitude_defense.Value ^ 2 + 2 * amplitude_attack * amplitude_defense.Value * cos(phase_attack - phase_defense.Value))
atan((amplitude_attack * sin(phase_attack) + amplitude_defense.Value * sin(phase_defense.Value)) / (amplitude_attack * cos(phase_attack) + amplitude_defense.Value * cos(phase_defense.Value)))
(cos (frequency_attack * x + phase_attack)) * unitPixels_attack * amplitude_attack + (cos (frequency_defense.Value * x + phase_defense.Value)) * unitPixels_attack * amplitude_defense.Value
